cs213.photoAlbum.model

Interface AlbumControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Album, Control

    public interface AlbumControl
    Album interface , allows user to add photos and delete photos to album , list and get/set photos as well, displays information in the order specified
    Author:
    Oskar Bero
